headline.print_headline: Creative Director Is Stepping Down at Banana Republic
headline.main: Banana Republic’s Creative Director Marissa Webb Is Leaving

snippet: Despite generating buzz in fashion circles Ms. Webb did not bring about a sales rebound for the struggling Gap brand.
abstract: Banana Republic creative director Marissa Webb is stepping down after just 18 months on job as sales continue to decline.
lead_paragraph: Despite generating buzz in fashion circles Ms. Webb did not bring about a sales rebound for the struggling Gap brand.
